job.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job.description: <p>Our CONFIDENTIAL, growth client&nbsp;is looking for experienced DevOps and Site Reliability Engineers who are interested in working with a fast-growing team in building industry-leading real estate data services. You will be working on a small team using cutting edge technology and tools to build and support infrastructure for our diverse environment including customer facing applications, large scale data processing, and APIs.</p><p><br></p><p>Technologies:</p><ul><li>Google Cloud (Compute, Storage, Networking)</li><li>Kubernetes</li><li>Helm</li><li>Terraform</li><li>CircleCI</li><li>Monitoring (DataDog or Stackdriver, StatusCake)</li><li>Linux</li><li>Bash</li><li>Python</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Application/Data Stack</p><ul><li>Airflow</li><li>Hasura</li><li>ETL processes</li><li>Database Development and support (Postgres, BigQuery, MongoDB)</li><li>GraphQL</li><li>Looker</li><li>Node.js,</li><li>React/Redux</li><li>Python</li></ul><p><br></p><p>If you can articulate the value of CI/CD and Infrastructure-as-code (IAC) and have hands-on coding experience with infrastructure management automation in the cloud (GCP OR AWS), would look forward to reviewing your background. </p><p><br></p><p><strong>Once you apply, we’ll send you the full job spec, all company information and a highlight of their leadership team.</strong></p>
